items.question: What kind of fractal designs can I create?
items.answer: You can create a wide variety of fractals, ranging from simple designs to intricate patterns. The tool allows you to customize colors, shapes, and complexity for endless possibilities.

items.question: Do I need any artistic skills to use the generator?
items.answer: No! The AI simplifies fractal creation, making it accessible for everyone, regardless of their artistic background. Just set your parameters and let the AI do the rest.

items.question: Can I use the fractals commercially?
items.answer: Yes! All fractals generated through WaveSpeed come with full commercial rights, allowing you to use them for marketing, sales, or personal projects without any additional fees.

items.question: How quickly can I generate fractals?
items.answer: Fractals can be generated in seconds, depending on the complexity of your design. Most designs are ready to download almost instantly!

items.question: What file formats do I receive for my fractals?
items.answer: You can download your fractals in high-quality PNG and JPEG formats, ideal for both digital and print usage.

items.question: Is there a limit to the number of fractals I can create?
items.answer: There are no limits! You can create as many fractals as you wish, allowing for complete creative freedom.

items.question: What if I want to make adjustments to a fractal?
items.answer: You can easily go back to adjust parameters and regenerate the fractal to get the perfect design you want.

items.question: Is there support available if I encounter issues?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our support team is available to assist you with any questions or concerns you may have while using the generator.
